results.summary: A 16-year-old boy is charged with murder after a teenager was fatally stabbed in a Birmingham park.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/736958a4-3cf8-e744-90a2-d423f0e2ee8b"><image id="68830606"/><paragraph role="introduction">A 16-year-old boy has been charged with murder after a teenager was fatally stabbed in a Birmingham park.</paragraph><paragraph>Hassan Mahmood, 15, was attacked in Oaklands Park, South Yardley shortly before 18:00 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>He died in hospital after suffering a single stab wound to the back, West Midlands Police said.</paragraph><paragraph>Another 16-year-old boy has been charged with assisting an offender. The pair, who cannot be named for legal reasons, are due in court on Friday.</paragraph><paragraph>They will both appear at Birmingham Youth Court.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/736958a4-3cf8-e744-90a2-d423f0e2ee8b"><paragraph>A 16-year-old boy has been charged with murder after a teenager was fatally stabbed in a Birmingham park.</paragraph><paragraph>Hassan Mahmood, 15, was attacked in Oaklands Park, South Yardley shortly before 18:00 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>He died in hospital after suffering a single stab wound to the back, West Midlands Police said.</paragraph><paragraph>Another 16-year-old boy has been charged with assisting an offender. The pair, who cannot be named for legal reasons, are due in court on Friday.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

68830606.caption: Hassan Mahmood was stabbed once in the back

68830209.caption: Tributes to Hassan Mahmood have been left at the scene of the stabbing
68830209.altText: Floral tributes at the scene of a stabbing in Yardley

results.headline: Hassan Mahmood stabbing: Teenager charged with murder
